languages.text:
The Cyber-Mastiff's attacks against the Burning targets can't miss and deal {uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} additional Fire damage.
The Cyber-Mastiff is now immune to Fire damage.

traits.locale_text:
The Cyber-Mastiff's attacks against the Burning targets can't miss and deal {uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} additional Fire damage.
The Cyber-Mastiff is now immune to Fire damage.

languages.text: When the cyber-mastiff attacks a target, it deals +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If the target suffers from the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect, it cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} the cyber-mastiff's attack.

traits.locale_text: When the cyber-mastiff attacks a target, it deals +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If the target suffers from the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect, it cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} the cyber-mastiff's attack.

When the cyber-mastiff attacks a target, it deals +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If the target suffers from the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect, it cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} the cyber-mastiff's attack.

When the cyber-mastiff attacks a target, it deals +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If the target suffers from the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect, it cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} the cyber-mastiff's attack.

languages.text: При атаке кибермастиф наносит {uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} дополнительно. Если на цель наложено {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, то она не может избежать атаки кибермастифа {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонением{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированием{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блокированием{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the cyber-mastiff attacks a target, it deals +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If the target suffers from the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect, it cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} the cyber-mastiff's attack.

traits.locale_text: Атакующий кибермастиф наносит дополнительно +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g}. Если на цель наложен эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, она не может {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блокировать{/g} атаку кибермастифа.

Атакующий кибермастиф наносит дополнительно +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g}. Если на цель наложен эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, она не может {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блокировать{/g} атаку кибермастифа.

При атаке кибермастиф наносит {uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} дополнительно. Если на цель наложено {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, то она не может избежать атаки кибермастифа {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонением{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированием{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блокированием{/g}.

languages.text: サイバーマスチフが対象を攻撃すると、+{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea}の追加{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g} を与える。対象が{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}効果を受けている場合、サイバーマスチフの攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、または{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}することはできない。
languages.original_text: When the cyber-mastiff attacks a target, it deals +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If the target suffers from the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect, it cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} the cyber-mastiff's attack.

traits.locale_text: サイバーマスチフが対象を攻撃すると、+{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea}の追加{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g} を与える。対象が{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}効果を受けている場合、サイバーマスチフの攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、または{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}することはできない。

languages.text: Lorsque le cyber-mastiff attaque une cible, il inflige +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} supplémentaires. Si la cible souffre de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, elle ne peut ni {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g}, ni {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g}, ni {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloquer{/g} l'attaque du cyber-mastiff.
languages.original_text: When the cyber-mastiff attacks a target, it deals +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If the target suffers from the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect, it cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} the cyber-mastiff's attack.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le cyber-mastiff attaque une cible, il inflige +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} supplémentaires. Si la cible souffre de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, elle ne peut ni {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g}, ni {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g}, ni {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloquer{/g} l'attaque du cyber-mastiff.

languages.text: Cuando el cibermastín ataca a un objetivo, inflige +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} adicional. Si el objetivo sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, no puede {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g}, ni {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloquear{/g} el ataque del cibermastín.
languages.original_text: When the cyber-mastiff attacks a target, it deals +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If the target suffers from the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect, it cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} the cyber-mastiff's attack.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el cibermastín ataca a un objetivo, inflige +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} adicional. Si el objetivo sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, no puede {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g}, ni {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloquear{/g} el ataque del cibermastín.

languages.text: 当生化獒犬攻击目标时，额外对其造成{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea}点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。如果目标处于{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态，则无法{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}生化獒犬的攻击。
languages.original_text: When the cyber-mastiff attacks a target, it deals +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If the target suffers from the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect, it cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} the cyber-mastiff's attack.

traits.locale_text: 当生化獒犬攻击目标时，额外对其造成{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea}点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。如果目标处于{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态，则无法{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}生化獒犬的攻击。

languages.text: Greift der Cyber-Mastiff ein Ziel an, verursacht er +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g}. Ist das Ziel mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-Effekt belegt, kann es dem Angriff des Cyber-Mastiffs nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} und ihn nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}, oder {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocken{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the cyber-mastiff attacks a target, it deals +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If the target suffers from the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect, it cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} the cyber-mastiff's attack.

traits.locale_text: Greift der Cyber-Mastiff ein Ziel an, verursacht er +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g}. Ist das Ziel mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-Effekt belegt, kann es dem Angriff des Cyber-Mastiffs nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} und ihn nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}, oder {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocken{/g}.

languages.text: Siber mastif, bir hedefe saldırdığında +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} ilave {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} verir. Hedef; {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} etkisine maruz kalmışsa siber mastifin saldırısına karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g} yapamaz.
languages.original_text: When the cyber-mastiff attacks a target, it deals +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} additional {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If the target suffers from the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect, it cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} the cyber-mastiff's attack.

traits.locale_text: Siber mastif, bir hedefe saldırdığında +{uip|FireDamage|a02ad192625a4bc289b3a59008ab84ea} ilave {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} verir. Hedef; {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} etkisine maruz kalmışsa siber mastifin saldırısına karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g} yapamaz.
